checksum.Description: specify checksum for this request, could be used as content md5 or etag

credential.Description: specify how to provide credential for service or storage

dir_func.Description: specify what todo with a dir object

endpoint.Description: specify how to provide endpoint for service or storage

expire.Description: specify when the url returned by reach will expire

file_func.Description: specify what todo with a file object

index.Description: specify the index of this segment

location.Description: specify the location for service or storage

object_func.Description: specify what todo with an object

offset.Description: specify offset for this request, storage will seek to this offset before read

project.Description: specify project name/id for this service or storage

read_callback_func.Description: specify what todo every time we read data from source

segment_func.Description: specify what todo with a segment

size.Description: specify size for this request, storage will only read limited content data

storage_class.Description: specify checksum for this request, could be used as storage class

storager_func.Description: specify what todo with a storager

work_dir.Description: specify the work dir for service or storage, every operation will be relative to this dir. work_dir MUST start with / for every storage services. work_dir will be default to / if not set.
